dt: {bc}a usually indoor court game between two teams of usually five players each who score by tossing an inflated ball through a raised goal

shortdef: a usually indoor court game between two teams of usually five players each who score by tossing an inflated ball through a raised goal; also : the ball used in this game

dt: {bc}of, relating to, or being a game in which participants create and manage imaginary teams consisting of players from a particular sport and scoring is based on the statistical performances of the actual players

dt.t: The draft is the best part of being part of a {phrase}fantasy league{/phrase}. … You get to choose the players you like and want to watch and help you win.
Paula [Knoy] knows how to sacrifice for her {phrase}fantasy team{/phrase}, even passing up a player like Eli Manning from her favorite New York Giants for a higher scoring quarterback.

shortdef: of, relating to, or being a game in which participants create and manage imaginary teams consisting of players from a particular sport and scoring is based on the statistical performances of the actual players
